article_title: Nations receiving US arms told to abide by laws of war
sentence: Israel's  military  campaign  was  prompted  by  a  7  October  Hamas  attack  on  Israeli  territory  that  killed  1,200  people,  according  to  Israeli  officials.

article_title: Nations receiving US arms told to abide by laws of war
sentence: Since  Israel's  retaliatory  offensive,  more  than  27,800  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  at  least  67,000  have  been  injured,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Nations receiving US arms told to abide by laws of war
sentence: Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.

article_title: Nations receiving US arms told to abide by laws of war
sentence: This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
